climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 𝐂𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠 & 𝐒𝐤𝐢𝐧 𝐟𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥: The body pillow is made of different materials on both sides. The cooling cover is made of organic cotton textile fabric, it can keep the hot sleepers cool all the night. The other side is made of bamboo fiber, soft and skin-friendly.

𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 & 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞: Filled with shredded memory foam ensures the body pillow does not shift and clump. The best resilience and softness to keep you enough support no matter what side you sleep on, keeping you comfortable all night long.

𝐀𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐁𝐨𝐝𝐲 𝐏𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐨𝐰: Designed for side sleepers is that the body pillow is adjustable. If you want a lower loft, simply open the zippered cover and remove the inner fill as much or as little foam as you want offor a better feel.

𝐖𝐚𝐬𝐡𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 & 𝐁𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞: The bamboo pillowcase is removalbe. It could be taken off and machine washable separately or with pillow together, tumble dry on low temperature is better. The pillow is vacuum packed during shipping. After received it, please pat the pillow to make the memory foam stuffing loose, and allow 24hrs to restore its original fluffy.

𝐖𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐥𝐲 𝐀𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: The cuddle pillows are support multiple position for different people's need--adult, children and pregnant, help side sleepers support multiple body parts. It efficiently relieve back pain, pregnancy discomfort, body tired.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Skin friendly & Breathable The cooling cover is made of organic cotton textile fabric, it can keep cool all night. The other side is made of microfiber, soft and skin-friendly. Memory Foam Gel The inner cover has a zipper for flexibility. If you feel it's too heavy, remove some foam to lighten it for a more comfortable experience. Fluffy & Firm Pillows are vacuum-sealed during the shipping process. Upon receipt, gently pat the pillow to loosen the memory foam filling, sit for 48 hours 20x54 inch The body pillow is filled with memory foam, providing extra comfort and enough support while you sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pillow ever!
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is really big and comfortable. Super soft, durable, and works as either a side placement if your bed is against the wall or along your headboard. I actually liked it so much I bought a second one. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huge! Holds its shape once adjusted to meet your needs
reviews.reviewText: This body pillow is the real deal. Filled with shredded memory foam, it comes sealed and expands fully in less than an hour. When fully stuffed, it is 7-8” thick and pretty heavy. Great for someone in need of real support, and can be adjusted by removing some of the foam to give you the exact amount of support or give you’re looking for. It maintains its shape and does not flatten out even when you rest a good amount of body weight on it for hours. It does not come with a pillowcase, but I easily found one to fit it perfectly. The material is very soft and cooling, and it has a nice sturdy zipper that doesn’t budge on its own. For the price, this is a great deal, and I anticipate it lasting quite a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cooling body pillow is a good size. Perfect for sleeping on the side. Can sleep with it under your knees too. Very comfortable. You can buy more stuffing if you want it more firm. Let it sit about 24 hours to let the pillow fluffy. There is a weird smell inside the pillow. I have let it air out and I can still smell it. Will let it air longer and see if that will help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bit big but so comfy
reviews.reviewText: The pillow doesn’t hold heat too badly and there is a lot of shredded memory foam pieces so it’s pretty thick. I think it’s a standard size body pillow and normal body pillow cases fit it. It did have a slight chemical smell when opened but that went away within a few hours. You should let it sit for a bit to fluff up because it comes in vacuum sealed. I think mine fluffed within a few hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very soft but not too soft. Good size. Has some weight, but it's not too heavy to maneuver. True to description and images. I really enjoy this body pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised when I got this - it came compressed in a cylindrical tube-like carrying case. Pull it out of the case and it expands quickly (I don't know if I'll ever be able to put it back in its zippered carrying case, but I'm not worried about doing that anytime soon.) It supports well, my partner likes it as much as I do, so this was a great acquisition for me. If you're looking for a body pillow, this is a good one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great body pillow!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great pillow! It is very comfortable after it re-inflates from its vacuum packaging and has a nice cooling feel to it. It feels well constructed and I'm not worried about it falling apart quickly. Very happy with it!
